SketchyRenderer.cpp

00001 #include "SketchyRenderer.h"
00002 
00003 #include "../math/MathManager.h"
00004 using namespace jvgs::math;
00005 
00006 namespace jvgs
00007 {
00008     namespace video
00009     {
00010         SketchyRenderer::SketchyRenderer()
00011         {
00012             noiseX = new Noise(-2.0f, 2.0f, 5);
00013             noiseY = new Noise(-2.0f, 2.0f, 5);
00014         }
00015 
00016         SketchyRenderer::~SketchyRenderer()
00017         {
00018             delete noiseX;
00019             delete noiseY;
00020         }
00021 
00022         void SketchyRenderer::begin(RenderType type)
00023         {
00024             Renderer::begin(type);
00025             vectorList.clear();
00026             noiseX->seed();
00027             noiseY->seed();
00028         }
00029 
00030         void SketchyRenderer::end()
00031         {
00032             Renderer::end();
00033 
00034             int repeat = MathManager::getInstance()->randInt(1, 10);
00035             int start = 0, end = (int) vectorList.size();
00036             while(repeat > 0) {
00037                 glBegin(GL_LINE_STRIP);
00038                 
00039                 for(int i = start; i < end; i++) {
00040                     Vector2D vector2d = vectorList[i];
00041                     glVertex2f(vector2d.getX() + noiseX->nextValue(),
00042                             vector2d.getY() + noiseY->nextValue());
00043                 }
00044 
00045                 glEnd();
00046 
00047                 start = MathManager::getInstance()->randInt(0,
00048                         (int) vectorList.size());
00049                 end = MathManager::getInstance()->randInt(0,
00050                         (int) vectorList.size());
00051 
00052                 if(start > end) {
00053                     int tmp = end;
00054                     end = start;
00055                     start = tmp;
00056                 }
00057 
00058                 repeat--;
00059             }
00060 
00061             vectorList.clear();
00062         }
00063 
00064         void SketchyRenderer::vector(const Vector2D &vector)
00065         {
00066             vectorList.push_back(vector);
00067         }
00068     };
00069 };
